content: be prepared to squeal with cuteness at this adorable black pig that is simply easy to crochet up with this free pattern his name is pchan and he comes from one of my favorite old school anime ranma 1/2 he s a pig with a very terrible sense of direction and has a tendency to get lost quite often he has a very dashing yellow bandana with slash marks all around ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your pchan turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 you can also crochet along with me on the pchan the pig video tutorial 2 on my youtube channel ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy **approximate size ** 10 inches in length and 7 inches in height **need to know ** single_crochet half_double_crochet increase and decrease chain 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //youtu be/vxxfigafueq
